title: Macbook A2141 PPBUS_G3H Shorted
message:
Hello,
Macbook A2141 not getting on.

Found PPBUS_G3H shorted. Removed the Fuses F7000/1. 

Diode Mode Readings (red to ground)
PPVBAT_G3H_CHGR_REG is.488
PPBUS_G3H is .013.

Started checking SSD Coils.
L9080 is 0.351
L9580 is 0.005

title: Macbook A2141 PPBUS_G3H Shorted
message:
Bad news if NAND chips have been damaged.
We have many threads on the forum about SSD problems on A2141.

Remove U9580 and check again diode mode at PPBUS_G3H.
If short disappeared, check aat L9580 too.
If still low there, at least one NAND is fried.

title: Macbook A2141 PPBUS_G3H Shorted
message:
Removed U9580. PPBUS_Short is Gone.
But L9580 is still low.

title: Macbook A2141 PPBUS_G3H Shorted
message: Then you have to deal with SSD failure now.
